title: E0277 UI Testing Normalization
body:
Moving from Rust 1.54.0 to 1.55.0, the output for E0277 appears to have changed to become more descriptive (🎉 yay!). **Original** ```rust error[E0277]: the trait bound `TestState: TransitionTo<_>` is not satisfied --> $DIR/require_transition_to.rs:38:9 | 38 | Transition::next(self, TestState) | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ the trait `TransitionTo<_>` is not implemented for `TestState` | = note: required by `Transition::::next` ``` **New** ```rust error[E0277]: the trait bound `TestState: TransitionTo<_>` is not satisfied --> $DIR/require_transition_to.rs:38:9 | 38 | Transition::next(self, TestState) | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ the trait `TransitionTo<_>` is not implemented for `TestState` | note: required by `Transition::::next` --> /home/runner/work/krator/krator/krator/src/state.rs:43:5 | 43 | / pub fn next, O: State>(_i: Box, o: O) -> Transition 44 | | where 45 | | I: TransitionTo, | |___________________________^ ``` Unfortunately, it does not look like UI testing normalization is being applied to the new output section. By my reading [here](https://rustc-dev-guide.rust-lang.org/tests/adding.html#output-normalization), all line numbers, column numbers, and source paths should be normalized. It mentions _not_ normalizing under some circumstances, but I believe that only applies to line and column numbers for _test_ files, whereas our main issue is with the file path for the source file. I expected to see this happen **(Note line numbers and source path in second section):** ```rust error[E0277]: the trait bound `TestState: TransitionTo<_>` is not satisfied --> $DIR/require_transition_to.rs:38:9 | 38 | Transition::next(self, TestState) | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ the trait `TransitionTo<_>` is not implemented for `TestState` | note: required by `Transition::::next` --> $SRC_DIR/src/state.rs:LL:CC | LL | / pub fn next, O: State>(_i: Box, o: O) -> Transition LL | | where LL | | I: TransitionTo, | |___________________________^ ``` Apologies if this is not a compiler issue, or is expected behavior. If so, please let me know! ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.55.0 (c8dfcfe04 2021-09-06) binary: rustc commit-hash: c8dfcfe046a7680554bf4eb612bad840e7631c4b commit-date: 2021-09-06 host: aarch64-apple-darwin release: 1.55.0 LLVM version: 12.0.1 ```
Backtrace

``` N/A ```
